name: Ghoul Tower Defense
description:
How to play: build tower and use powers to defeat ghouls. Towers and powers will require life and you can choose from:

Archer Tower - Medium Range,Medium damage, slightly slows ghouls
Catapult - Large Range, High Damage, moderately slows ghouls
Paladin - High Attack Speed, Medium damage, slightly removes slow from ghouls

and

Pierce(Shield) - reduces armour of enemies in an area
Speed(Arrow) - slows ghouls in an area
Damage(brokenhear) - deals damage to ghouls in an area
